meanings.sent1: The underbred dog barked loudly in the park.
meanings.sent2: She found the underbred behavior at the party quite rude.
meanings.sent3: The underbred manners of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her underbred taste in music was like nails on a chalkboard to him.
meanings.sent5: The underbred painting lacked the elegance of the others in the gallery.

meanings.sent1: The underbred cat knocked over the vase with a clumsy paw.
meanings.sent2: He felt out of place in the underbred neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The underbred jokes at the party fell flat.
meanings.sent4: Her underbred accent stood out in the refined crowd.
meanings.sent5: The underbred manners of the guest were a topic of discussion after the event.
